formalText: So Tanya and he were doing couples counseling but they stopped going to see him.
And everyday sort of like she gets up and it's a reset as to whether it will be a good day or a bad day.

He thinks couples counseling can and with the right person will help them, but certainly if they're going to be okay they're going to do that. Couples counseling is a particular venue to do certain things and certain insights and to be together and that was actually a very helpful experience in the sense of uniting them against a third party.
So it wasn't all bad in a lot of ways.
It was like they became closer to that experience.
